title: FansDB Docs
description: FansDB is invite-only crowdsourced metadata database focused on independent adult content creators and adult platforms.

items.title: Guidelines structure update
items.content_html: With more and more new users joining in and starting to contribute, this is a perfect time to hopefully make the guidelines more readable and easier to follow.

items.title: Revamp of the Docs
items.content_html: As some of you might have noticed we revamped the docs site to make it more functional and easier to navigate.

items.title: FansDB scope expansion and new platforms
items.content_html: After some internal discussions and a non-binding public poll{target=_blank} where majority of people voted in favor of allowing only pay-per-view (PPV) platforms, we decided to expand the scope of approved platforms on FansDB once again.

items.title: New Domain
items.content_html:
As many of you might now, we had a lot of issues with .xyz domain so to try to mitigate those issues we bought new domain fansdb.cc.

Both domains will op...

items.title: Big Change with FansDB
items.content_html: After some internal discussions, we decided to expand the scope of approved platforms on FansDB. This would extend to pay-per-view (PPV) content of already approved platforms that was previously not allowed.

items.title: How to Join FansDB?
items.content_html: Add a section on how to join FansDB.

items.title: Launch of FansDB Docs Site
items.content_html: The documentation site was offically launched with the initial guidelines.
